original_title: Evaluation of 12 subjects of 2022 A/L exam already underway
original_body_lines: The Commissioner General of Examinations Amith Jayasundara says that the evaluation of 12 subjects of the 2022 (2023) G.C.E. Advance Level examinations has already commenced.
Further, he also emphasized that steps are being taken to complete the evaluation of the rest of the subjects as well.
